document_data.name: Landrar Dathcloake
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Landrar Dathcloake''' was a noble of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Landrar Dathcloake proposed a council of nobles that would have governance over the [[War Wizards of Cormyr]], the armies, and that would choose successors for the royal line. He got cheered for that.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Later, after the Council degenerated into violence and was assaulted by a [[blueflame ghost]], and the nobility left the chamber, the evil [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] believed he spotted Dathcloake blustering at the [[Purple Dragons]] guarding the entrance, trying without success to gain access.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|107|11}}
